fontSizeText: Current text will be the avarage size in the application, all other sizes will be adjusted to this value. Size can be bigger and smaller than this
darkModeText: By default, the app uses your system's theme mode. You can change the mode anytime using the sidebar. If you set your preferred mode here, it will be linked to your account and apply across all your devices, regardless of their system settings. Don't worryâ€”you can still adjust it through the sidebar whenever you like.

greet1: I have been trying to give you the freedom...
greet2: The freedom to create without any tech barriers...
greet3: To imagine beyond the ordinary box.
greet4: Look around... Do you see all these boxes?
greet5: Some are filled with my ideas, showing you what's possible...
greet6: But most are left open, waiting for your imagination.
greet7: Because the rest of the story is yours to create.
